gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਸਿਖ ੲੇਕਮੇਕ ਰੋਮ ਮਹਿਮਾ ਅਨੰਤ ਅਗਮ ਅਪਾਰ ਗੁਰ ਮਹਿਮਾ ਨਿਧਾਨ ਹੈ
transliteration: Gursikh Aykamayk Rom Mahimaa Ananta , Agam Apaar Gur Mahimaa Nidhaan Hai ?
translation: By virtue of inexhaustible toil of Naam Simran in the service of a True Guru, the praise of a hair of a Gursikh is infinite. Then the inaccessible Satguru with countless virtues is a treasure house of praises.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਸਿਖ ੲੇਕਮੇਕ ਬੋਲ ਕੋ ਨ ਤੋਲ ਮੋਲ ਸ੍ਰੀ ਗੁਰ ਸਬਦ ਅਗਮਿਤਿ ਗਿਅਾਨ ਧਿਅਾਨ ਹੈ
transliteration: Gursikh Aykamayk Bol Ko N Tol Mola , Sree Gur Sabad Agamiti Giaan Dhiaan Hai ?
translation: Those who obey the commands of their True Guru; those who are one with their Guru; their words are beyond evaluation. Then the divine words of a True Guru, his Gyan (knowledge) and reflection on his precepts is beyond comprehension.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਸਿਖ ੲੇਕਮੇਕ ਦ੍ਰਿਸਟਿ ਦ੍ਰਿਸਟਿ ਤਾਰੈ ਸ੍ਰੀ ਗੁਰ ਕਟਾਛ ਕ੍ਰਿਪਾ ਕੋ ਨ ਪਰਮਾਨ ਹੈ
transliteration: Gursikh Aykamayk Drisati Drisati Taarai , Sree Gur Kataachh Kripaa Ko N Paramaan Hai ?
translation: When one who is in harmony with True Guru, who meditates on His name, his one glimpse is good enough to sail the recipient across the ocean. Then the intensity of power of a True Guru is incomprehensible.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਸਿਖ ੲੇਕਮੇਕ ਪਲ ਸੰਗ ਰੰਗ ਰਸ ਅਬਿਗਤ ਗਤਿ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਨਿਰਬਾਨ ਹੈ ||੭੩||
transliteration: Gursikh Aykamayk Pal Sang Rang Rasa , Abigat Gati Satigur Nirabaan Hai ?73?
translation: The company of a person for a second, who is deep into the meditation of Lord's name bless one with happiness, ecstasy and elixir of life. Like indestructible Lord, Satguru  is an epitome of eternal bliss. (73)
